big challenges, big opportunities

courtesy Orkney.com
courtesy Orkney.com

we might be the smallest local authority in Scotland, but our dedication to our islands is unmatched

Orkney Islands Council offers all kinds of services to our community, so careers here provide lots of different opportunities to learn and grow. A career with us gives you the opportunity to do work that matters.

Whether you are leaving school, college or university, everyone’s welcome at OIC. We can help you develop the skills and experience you need to build a successful career, all while making a difference to our local community.
